Name: Treeker: The Lost Glasses Remake
About the game: Treeker: The Lost Glasses is a first-person adventure game, with puzzles and platform elements. Many stories and tales have been told across the centuries. However, some of those stories have something intriguing in common: a pair of glasses. Pirates and treasure hunters wearing mysterious lenses that can unveil things not visible otherwise. Could those glasses be actually more than imagination?
